content: The sizes are shown for the Retina displays. For the displays with standard resolutions the logo width and height will be resized accordingly upon upload.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that explains how logo sizes will be resized on standard-resolution displays when uploaded, appearing next to a settings button in the WhiteLabelHeader.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "will be resized" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Arabic. A more accurate and natural rendering would convey that the logo's size will be adjusted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تعديل عرض الشعار وارتفاعه (or سيتم تغيير حجم عرض الشعار وارتفاعه) - This conveys the meaning of resizing in a more natural way.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes unnecessary spacing between words. While not incorrect, it doesn't adhere to typical Arabic typography conventions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove extra spaces between words for better readability (e.g., 'سيتم تعديل عرض الشعار وارتفاعه').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "displeylər" is a misspelling of "displeylər".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: displeylər

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure in the second part of the translation can be improved for better flow. Specifically, the phrase 'standart ekranlar üçün loqonun eni və hündürlüyü yükləmə zamanı müvafiq olaraq dəyişdiriləcək' is a bit convoluted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Standart ekranlarda loqo yüklənən zaman, ölçüləri müvafiq olaraq dəyişdiriləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly" is not perfectly conveyed by "съответно преоразмерени". While not incorrect, a more natural Bulgarian phrasing would improve clarity. 'Съответно' implies a direct correspondence, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Показаните размери са за Retina дисплеи. За дисплеите със стандартни разделителни способности ширината и височината на логото ще бъдат автоматично преоразмерени при качване.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "will be resized accordingly upon upload" is not accurately translated. "θα αλλάξουν ανάλογα το μέγεθος" literally translates to "will change according to the size" which doesn't convey the meaning of resizing proportionally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: θα αλλάξουν αναλογικά κατά τη μεταφόρτωση

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "το μέγεθος" after "αναλογικά" is awkward and grammatically incorrect. It's redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: θα αλλάξουν αναλογικά κατά τη μεταφόρτωση.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks a period at the end of the first sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koot näytetään Retinanäytöille.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly upon upload" is not accurately reflected in the Armenian translation. The current translation implies a resizing action *after* the upload, but the English implies it happens *during* the upload process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to better convey the simultaneous resizing action, something along the lines of: "Ստանդարտ լուծումներ ունեցող էկրանների համար պատկերանշանի լայնությունը և բարձրությունը համապատասխանաբար կփոփոխվեն վերբեռնման ընթացքում:" (The logo width and height will be resized during the upload process)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ອັບໂຫລດ' is a transliteration and not a direct Lao word. A more appropriate term for 'upload' would be 'ການໂຫລດຂໍ້ມູນ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການໂຫລດຂໍ້ມູນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຄວາມກວ້າງແລະຄວາມສູງຂອງໂລໂກ້ຈະຖືກປັບຂະຫນາດ' is grammatically correct but could be improved for flow and readability. It's a little wordy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄວາມກວ້າງແລະຄວາມສູງຂອງໂລໂກ້ຈະປ່ຽນຕາມຂະຫນາດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly upon upload" is not the most natural translation of "resized accordingly upon upload". A more fluid translation would be "tiks pielāgoti pievienojot".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tiks pielāgoti pievienojot

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a period (.) instead of a colon (:) after 'Retina displays'.  The original English uses a colon to introduce an explanation. While not strictly incorrect, maintaining consistency with the English structure would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace '.' with ':' after 'wyświetlaczy Retina'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "mostradores da Retina" is an unusual translation of "Retina displays." It suggests dials or faces, not the display screens themselves. It’s not a natural or accurate rendering of the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os ecrãs Retina

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "no momento do carregamento do ficheiro" (at the moment of file upload) is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Portuguese. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ao fazer upload do ficheiro

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'scalează' (scales) isn't the best equivalent for 'resized'. 'Redimensionate' or 'ajustate' would be more accurate to convey the resizing action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru rezoluţie de ecran standard, lăţimea şi înălţimea siglei se redimensionează/ajustează corespunzător la încărcare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'upload' is translated as 'načítaní' which more accurately means 'loading'. 'Upload' implies actively sending a file, while 'načítaní' implies a more passive loading process. A more accurate translation for 'upload' would be 'nahrati'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rozmery sú pre Retina obrazovky. Pri obrazovkách so štandardným rozlíšením sa šírka a výška loga prispôsobí pri nahratí.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Величина су приказане" is grammatically awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "The sizes are shown". A more natural phrasing would be "Величине су наведене" or "Показане су величине".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Величине су наведене

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "аутоматски прилагођене" is a bit technical. A more user-friendly translation for "resized accordingly" might be "промењене" or "прилагођене".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: прилагођене

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'resized accordingly' is not perfectly captured by 'prilagođene'. While 'prilagođene' implies adaptation, 'resized' has a more precise meaning referring to scaling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation could be improved to something like 'Veličine su prikazane za Retina ekrane. Za ekrane sa standardnim rezolucijama, širina i visina logotipa će biti automatski skalirane prilikom otpremanja.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'upload' is translated as 'передавання'. While technically correct, 'завантаження' is a more common and natural translation for 'upload' in the context of file uploads.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розміри вказані для дисплеїв Retina. Для дисплеїв зі стандартною роздільною здатністю ширина та висота логотипа будуть відповідно змінені після завантаження.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly" is not perfectly conveyed by "thay đổi kích thước tương ứng". While 'thay đổi kích thước' means 'resized', 'tương ứng' implies a direct, one-to-one correspondence, which isn't necessarily the case. The resizing algorithm might involve some scaling or adjustment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Các kích thước được hiển thị cho màn hình Retina. Đối với màn hình có độ phân giải tiêu chuẩn, chiều rộng và chiều cao logo sẽ được điều chỉnh kích thước khi tải lên.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "The sizes are shown for the Retina displays" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 该尺寸适用于 Retina 屏幕。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "徽标宽度和高度将在上传时相应调整" is accurate but could be more concise. '相应调整' is a bit formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 徽标的宽度和高度会自动调整。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "in accordance with the circumstances" ("në përputhje me rrethanat") doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "resized accordingly". It's too vague. It should imply automatic resizing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Madhësitë tregohen për ekranet Retina. Për ekranet me rezolucion standard, gjerësia dhe lartësia e logos do të rikonfigurohen automatikisht pas ngarkimit.
